 63#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 64template <dimension_type D,
 65	  typename I,
 66	  typename O,
 67	  int S,
 68	  return_mechanism_type R,
 69	  unsigned N>
 70struct List<op::fft<D, I, O, S, R, N> >
 71{
 72  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 73			 be::cuda,
 74			 be::cbe_sdk,
 75			 be::mercury_sal,
 76			 be::intel_ipp,
 77			 be::fftw3,
 78			 be::cvsip,
 79			 be::generic,
 80			 be::no_fft>::type type;
 81};

 84	  typename O,
 85	  int A,
 86	  int D,
 87	  return_mechanism_type R,
 88	  unsigned N>
 89struct List<op::fftm<I, O, A, D, R, N> >
 90{
 91  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 92			 be::cuda,
 93			 be::cbe_sdk,
 94			 be::mercury_sal,
 95			 be::intel_ipp,
 96			 be::fftw3,
 97			 be::cvsip,
 98			 be::generic,
 99			 be::no_fft>::type type;
100};

117namespace fft
118{
119
120/// These numbers are 'number-of-times' constants as they
121/// map to FFTW planning strategies. We list them here since
122/// they are used outside the FFTW backend, too (CVSIP).
123///
124/// number-of-times >= 32 or 0 (infinity)... patient
125/// number-of-times >= 12 .................. measure
126/// else ................................... estimate
127enum fftw_planning { estimate=1, measure=12, patient=32};
128
129template <dimension_type D, typename I, typename O, int A, int E>
130class Interface : public profile::Accumulator<profile::signal>
131{
132  typedef profile::Accumulator<profile::signal> accumulator_type;
133public:
134  static dimension_type const dim = D;
135  typedef typename impl::Scalar_of<I>::type scalar_type;
136
137  Interface(Domain<D> const &dom, scalar_type scale, 
138	    bool is_fftm, int dir, return_mechanism_type rm)
139    : accumulator_type(Description<D, I, O>::tag(is_fftm, dom, dir, rm, A),
140                       is_fftm ?
141                       (A == 1 ?
142                        // row-wise Fftm
143                        dom[0].size() * Op_count<I, O>::value
144                        (io_size<1, O, I, 0>::size(dom[1]).size()) :
145                        // column-wise Fftm
146                        dom[1].size() * Op_count<I, O>::value
147                        (io_size<1, O, I, 0>::size(dom[0]).size())) :
148                       // ! is_fftm
149                       Op_count<I, O>::value
150                       (io_size<D, O, I, A>::size(dom).size())),
151      input_size_(io_size<D, I, O, A>::size(dom)),
152      output_size_(io_size<D, O, I, A>::size(dom)),
153      scale_(scale)
154  {}
155
156  /// Returns a Domain<> object with first index set to :literal:`0`,
157  /// stride set to :literal:`1`, and size reflecting the appropriate
158  /// input view size for this :literal:`Fft` object.
159  Domain<dim> const& 
160  input_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
161  { return this->input_size_;}
162  
163  /// Returns a Domain<> object with first index set to :literal:`0`,
164  /// stride set to :literal:`1`, and size reflecting the appropriate
165  /// output view size for this :literal:`Fft` object.
166  Domain<dim> const& 
167  output_size() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
168  { return this->output_size_;}
169  
170  /// Returns the scale factor used in this :literal:`Fft` object.
171  scalar_type 
172  scale() const VSIP_NOTHROW 
173  { return this->scale_;}
174  
175  /// Returns :literal:`true` if this is a forward Fast Fourier Transformation.
176  bool 
177  forward() const VSIP_NOTHROW
178  { return E == -1;}
179  
180  float impl_performance(char const *what) const
181  {
182    if      (!strcmp(what, "mops")) return this->mops();
183    else if (!strcmp(what, "time")) return this->total();
184    else if (!strcmp(what, "count")) return this->count();
185    else return 0.f;
186  }
187
188protected:
189  Domain<dim> input_size_;
190  Domain<dim> output_size_;
191  scalar_type scale_;
192};
193
194} // namespace vsip::impl::fft
195
196template <dimension_type D,                      //< Dimension
197	  typename I,                            //< Input type
198	  typename O,                            //< Output type
199	  typename L,                            //< Dispatcher list
200	  int S = 0,                             //< Special dimension
201	  return_mechanism_type = by_value,      //< Return mechanism
202	  unsigned N = 0,                        //< Number of times
203	  alg_hint_type = alg_time>              //< algorithm Hint
204class Fft_facade;
205
206template <dimension_type D,
207	  typename I,
208	  typename O,
209	  typename L,
210	  int S,
211	  unsigned N,
212	  alg_hint_type H>
213class Fft_facade<D, I, O, L, S, by_value, N, H>
214  : public fft::Interface<D, I, O,
215			  fft::axis<I, O, S>::value,
216			  fft::exponent<I, O, S>::value>
217{
218public:
219  static int const axis = fft::axis<I, O, S>::value;
220  static int const exponent = fft::exponent<I, O, S>::value;
221  typedef fft::Interface<D, I, O, axis, exponent> base;
222  typedef fft::Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> backend_type;
223
224#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
225  typedef fft::Ct_workspace<D, I, O> workspace;
226#else
227  typedef fft::workspace<D, I, O> workspace;
228#endif
229  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
230    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fft<D, I, O, S, by_value, N>,
231    std::auto_ptr<backend_type>(Domain<D> const &, typename base::scalar_type), L>
232    dispatcher_type;
233
234  Fft_facade(Domain<D> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
235    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
236    : base(dom, scale, false, S, by_value),
237#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
238      backend_(cvsip::create<backend_type>(dom, scale, N)),
239#else
240      backend_(dispatcher_type::dispatch(dom, scale)),
241#endif
242      workspace_(backend_.get(), this->input_size(), this->output_size(), scale)
243  {}
244
245#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
246  /// Returns the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in`.
247  template <typename ViewT>
248  typename fft::result<O, typename ViewT::block_type>::view_type
249  operator()(ViewT in) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
250  {
251    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
252    assert(extent(in) == extent(this->input_size()));
253    typedef fft::result<O, typename ViewT::block_type> traits;
254    typename traits::view_type out(traits::create(this->output_size(),
255                                                 in.block().map()));
256    workspace_.out_of_place(this->backend_.get(), in, out);
257    return out;
258  }
259#else
260  /// Returns the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in`.
261  template <typename ViewT>
262  typename fft::Result_rbo<D, I, O, ViewT, workspace, S>::view_type
263  operator()(ViewT in) VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
264  {
265    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
266    assert(extent(in) == extent(this->input_size()));
267    typedef fft::Result_rbo<D, I, O, ViewT, workspace, S> traits;
268    typedef typename traits::functor_type functor_type;
269    typedef typename traits::block_type   block_type;
270    typedef typename traits::view_type    view_type;
271
272    functor_type rf(in, this->output_size(), *(this->backend_.get()),
273		    workspace_);
274    block_type block(rf);
275    return view_type(block);
276  }
277#endif
278  friend class vsip::impl::diag_detail::Diagnose_fft;
279private:
280  std::auto_ptr<backend_type> backend_;
281  workspace workspace_;
282};
283
284template <dimension_type D,
285	  typename I,
286	  typename O,
287	  typename L,
288	  int S,
289	  unsigned N,
290	  alg_hint_type H>
291class Fft_facade<D, I, O, L, S, vsip::by_reference, N, H>
292  : public fft::Interface<D, I, O,
293			  fft::axis<I, O, S>::value,
294			  fft::exponent<I, O, S>::value>
295{
296public:
297  static int const axis = fft::axis<I, O, S>::value;
298  static int const exponent = fft::exponent<I, O, S>::value;
299  typedef fft::Interface<D, I, O, axis, exponent> base;
300  typedef fft::Fft_backend<D, I, O, S> backend_type;
301#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
302  typedef fft::Ct_workspace<D, I, O> workspace;
303#else
304  typedef fft::workspace<D, I, O> workspace;
305#endif
306  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
307    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fft<D, I, O, S, by_reference, N>,
308    std::auto_ptr<backend_type>(Domain<D> const &, typename base::scalar_type), L>
309    dispatcher_type;
310
311  Fft_facade(Domain<D> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
312    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
313    : base(dom, scale, false, S, by_reference),
314#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
315      backend_(cvsip::create<backend_type>(dom, scale, N)),
316#else
317      backend_(dispatcher_type::dispatch(dom, scale)),
318#endif
319      workspace_(backend_.get(), this->input_size(), this->output_size(), scale)
320  {}
321
322  /// Computes the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in` and stores the result
323  /// in :literal:`out`.
324  template <typename Block0, typename Block1,
325 	    template <typename, typename> class View0,
326 	    template <typename, typename> class View1>
327  View1<O,Block1>
328  operator()(View0<I,Block0> in, View1<O,Block1> out)
329    VSIP_NOTHROW
330  {
331    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
332    VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((View0<I,Block0>::dim == View1<O,Block1>::dim));
333    assert(extent(in) == extent(this->input_size()));
334    assert(extent(out) == extent(this->output_size()));
335    workspace_.out_of_place(this->backend_.get(), in, out);
336    return out;
337  }
338
339  /// Computes the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`inout` in place.
340  template <typename BlockT, template <typename, typename> class View>
341  View<I,BlockT>
342  operator()(View<I,BlockT> inout) VSIP_NOTHROW
343  {
344    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
345    assert(extent(inout) == extent(this->input_size()));
346    assert(extent(inout) == extent(this->output_size()));
347    workspace_.in_place(this->backend_.get(), inout);
348    return inout;
349  }
350
351  friend class vsip::impl::diag_detail::Diagnose_fft;
352private:
353  std::auto_ptr<backend_type> backend_;
354  workspace workspace_;
355};
356
357template <typename I,                       //< Input type
358	  typename O,                       //< Output type
359	  typename L,                       //< Dispatcher list
360	  int A,                            //< Axis
361	  int D,                            //< Direction
362	  return_mechanism_type,            //< Return mechanism
363	  unsigned N = 0,                   //< Number of times
364	  alg_hint_type = alg_time>         //< algorithm Hint
365class Fftm_facade;
366
367template <typename I,
368	  typename O,
369	  typename L,
370	  int A,
371	  int D,
372	  unsigned N,
373	  alg_hint_type H>
374class Fftm_facade<I, O, L, A, D, by_value, N, H>
375  : public fft::Interface<2, I, O, 1 - A, D == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
376{
377  static int const axis = 1 - A;
378  static int const exponent = D == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1;
379  typedef fft::Interface<2, I, O, axis, exponent> base;
380  typedef typename fft::Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> backend_type;
381#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
382  typedef fft::Ct_workspace<2, I, O> workspace;
383#else
384  typedef fft::workspace<2, I, O> workspace;
385#endif
386  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
387    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fftm<I, O, A, D, by_value, N>,
388    std::auto_ptr<backend_type>(Domain<2> const &, typename base::scalar_type), L>
389    dispatcher_type;
390public:
391  Fftm_facade(Domain<2> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
392    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
393    : base(dom, scale, true, D, by_value),
394#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
395      backend_(cvsip::create<backend_type>(dom, scale, N)),
396#else
397      backend_(dispatcher_type::dispatch(dom, scale)),
398#endif
399      workspace_(backend_.get(), this->input_size(), this->output_size(), scale)
400  {}
401
402#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
403  /// Returns the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in`.
404  template <typename BlockT>
405  typename fft::result<O,BlockT>::view_type
406  operator()(const_Matrix<I,BlockT> in)
407     VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
408  {
409    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
410    typedef fft::result<O,BlockT> traits;
411    typename traits::view_type out(traits::create(this->output_size(),
412                                                 in.block().map()));
413    assert(extent(in) == extent(this->input_size()));
414    if (Is_global_map<typename BlockT::map_type>::value &&
415        in.block().map().num_subblocks(A) != 1)
416      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented(
417        "Fftm requires dimension along FFT to not be distributed"));
418    workspace_.out_of_place(this->backend_.get(), in.local(), out.local());
419    return out;
420  }
421#else
422  /// Returns the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in`.
423  template <typename BlockT>  
424  typename fft::Result_fftm_rbo<I, O, BlockT, workspace, A, D>::view_type
425  operator()(const_Matrix<I,BlockT> in)
426    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
427  {
428    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
429    assert(extent(in) == extent(this->input_size()));
430
431    /* TODO: Return_blocks don't have a valid map() yet
432    if (Is_global_map<typename BlockT::map_type>::value &&
433	in.block().map().num_subblocks(A) != 1)
434      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented(
435	"Fftm requires dimension along FFT to not be distributed"));
436    */
437
438    typedef fft::Result_fftm_rbo<I, O, BlockT, workspace, A, D> traits;
439    typedef typename traits::functor_type functor_type;
440    typedef typename traits::block_type   block_type;
441    typedef typename traits::view_type    view_type;
442
443    functor_type rf(in, this->output_size(), *(this->backend_.get()),
444		    workspace_);
445    block_type block(rf);
446    return view_type(block);
447 }
448#endif
449
450  friend class vsip::impl::diag_detail::Diagnose_fftm;
451private:
452  std::auto_ptr<backend_type> backend_;
453  workspace workspace_;
454};
455
456template <typename I,
457	  typename O,
458	  typename L,
459	  int A,
460	  int D,
461	  unsigned N,
462	  alg_hint_type H>
463class Fftm_facade<I, O, L, A, D, vsip::by_reference, N, H>
464  : public fft::Interface<2, I, O, 1 - A, D == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1>
465{
466  // Fftm and 2D Fft share some underlying logic.
467  // The 'Special dimension' (S) template parameter in 2D Fft uses '0' to
468  // represent column-first and '1' for a row-first transformation, while
469  // the Fftm 'Axis' (A) parameter uses '0' to represent row-wise, and
470  // '1' for column-wise transformation.
471  // Thus, by using '1 - A' here we can share the implementation, too.
472  static int const axis = 1 - A;
473  static int const exponent = D == fft_fwd ? -1 : 1;
474  typedef fft::Interface<2, I, O, axis, exponent> base;
475  typedef typename fft::Fftm_backend<I, O, A, D> backend_type;
476#if VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
477  typedef fft::Ct_workspace<2, I, O> workspace;
478#else
479  typedef fft::workspace<2, I, O> workspace;
480#endif
481  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::Dispatcher<
482    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fftm<I, O, A, D, by_reference, N>,
483    std::auto_ptr<backend_type>(Domain<2> const &, typename base::scalar_type), L>
484    dispatcher_type;
485public:
486  Fftm_facade(Domain<2> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
487    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
488    : base(dom, scale, true, D, by_reference),
489#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
490      backend_(cvsip::create<backend_type>(dom, scale, N)),
491#else
492      backend_(dispatcher_type::dispatch(dom, scale)),
493#endif
494      workspace_(backend_.get(), this->input_size(), this->output_size(), scale)
495  {}
496
497  /// Computes the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`in` and stores the result
498  /// in :literal:`out`.
499  template <typename Block0, typename Block1>
500  Matrix<O,Block1>
501  operator()(const_Matrix<I,Block0> in, Matrix<O,Block1> out)
502    VSIP_NOTHROW
503  {
504    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
505    assert(extent(in)  == extent(this->input_size()));
506    assert(extent(out) == extent(this->output_size()));
507    if (Is_global_map<typename Block0::map_type>::value ||
508	Is_global_map<typename Block1::map_type>::value)
509    {
510      if (in.block().map().num_subblocks(A) != 1 ||
511	  out.block().map().num_subblocks(A) != 1)
512	VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented(
513	  "Fftm requires dimension along FFT to not be distributed"));
514      if (global_domain(in) != global_domain(out))
515	VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented(
516	  "Fftm requires input and output to have same mapping"));
517    }
518    workspace_.out_of_place(this->backend_.get(), in.local(), out.local());
519    return out;
520  }
521
522  /// Computes the Fast Fourier Transform of :literal:`inout` in place.
523  template <typename BlockT>
524  Matrix<O,BlockT>
525  operator()(Matrix<O,BlockT> inout) VSIP_NOTHROW
526  {
527    typename base::Scope scope(*this);
528    assert(extent(inout) == extent(this->input_size()));
529    if (Is_global_map<typename BlockT::map_type>::value &&
530	inout.block().map().num_subblocks(A) != 1)
531      VSIP_IMPL_THROW(unimplemented(
532	"Fftm requires dimension along FFT to not be distributed"));
533    workspace_.in_place(this->backend_.get(), inout.local());
534    return inout;
535  }
536
537  friend class vsip::impl::diag_detail::Diagnose_fftm;
538private:
539  std::auto_ptr<backend_type> backend_;
540  workspace workspace_;
541};
542
543} // namespace vsip::impl
544
545/// FFT operation type.
546/// Applying an FFT object on a view performs a single Fast Fourier Transform
547/// on the entire view. :literal:`Fft` supports different computations, dependent
548/// on the  input element type, output element type, a specified direction or a 
549/// *special dimension*, and the dimensionalities of the input and output views.
550///
551/// Template parameters:
552///   :V: View (:literal:`const_Vector` for 1D FFTs, :literal:`const_Matrix` for
553///       2D FFTs, :literal:`const_Tensor` for 3D FFTs)
554///   :I: Input type
555///   :O: Output type
556///   :S: Special Dimension
557///   :return_mechanism_type: one of :literal:`by_value` or :literal:`by_reference`
558///   :N: Anticipated number of times this object will be used.
559///   :H: This value indicates how the implementation should optimize its
560///       computation or resource use.
561///
562/// +-----+-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
563/// | dim | I / O                   | S       | input size             | output size       |
564/// +=====+=========================+=========+========================+===================+
565/// | 1D  | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_fwd | M                      | M                 |
566/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
567/// |     | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_inv | M                      | M                 |
568/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
569/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 0       | M                      | M/2 + 1           |
570/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
571/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 0       | M/2 + 1                | M                 |
572/// +-----+-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
573/// | 2D  | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_fwd | M x N                  | M x N             |
574/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
575/// |     | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_inv | M x N                  | M x N             |
576/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
577/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 0       | M x N                  | (M/2 + 1) x N     |
578/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
579/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 1       | M x N                  | M x (N/2 + 1)     |
580/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
581/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 0       | (M/2 + 1) x N          | M x N             |
582/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
583/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 1       | M x (N/2 + 1)          | M x N             |
584/// +-----+-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
585/// | 3D  | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_fwd | M x N x P              | M x N x P         |
586/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
587/// |     | complex<T> / complex<T> | fft_inv | M x N x P              | M x N x P         |
588/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
589/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 0       | M x N x P              | (M/2 + 1) x N x P |
590/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
591/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 1       | M x N x P              | M x (N/2 + 1) x P |
592/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
593/// |     | T / complex<T>          | 2       | M x N x P              | M x N x (P/2 + 1) |
594/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
595/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 0       | (M/2 + 1) x N x P      | M x N x P         |
596/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
597/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 1       | M x (N/2 + 1) x P      | M x N x P         |
598/// |     +-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
599/// |     | complex<T> / T          | 2       | M x N x (P/2 + 1)      | M x N x P         |
600/// +-----+-------------------------+---------+------------------------+-------------------+
601template <template <typename, typename> class V,
602	  typename I,
603	  typename O,
604	  int S = 0,
605	  return_mechanism_type R = by_value,
606	  unsigned N = 0,
607	  alg_hint_type H = alg_time>
608class Fft : public impl::Fft_facade<impl::Dim_of_view<V>::dim,
609  I, O,
610  typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::List<
611    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fft<impl::Dim_of_view<V>::dim, I, O, S, R, N> >::type,
612  S, R, N, H>
613{
614  static dimension_type const dim = impl::Dim_of_view<V>::dim;
615  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fft<dim, I, O, S, R, N> operation_type;
616  typedef impl::Fft_facade<
617    dim, I, O, 
618    typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::List<operation_type>::type,
619    S, R, N, H> base;
620public:
621  /// Create an :literal:`Fft` object.
622  ///
623  /// Arguments:
624  ///   :dom:   The domain of the view to be operated on.
625  ///   :scale: A scalar factor to be applied to the result.
626  Fft(Domain<dim> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
627    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc)) 
628    : base(dom, scale) {}
629};
630
631/// FFTM operation type.
632/// Applying an FFTM object on a matrix performs one Fast Fourier Transform
633/// per row or column, depending on its orientation. As :literal:`Fft`, it
634/// supports different computations, dependent on the  input element type and
635/// output element type.
636///
637/// Template parameters:
638///   :I: Input type
639///   :O: Output type
640///   :A: Orientation: one of :literal:`row` and :literal:`col`
641///   :D: Direction: one of :literal:`fft_fwd` and :literal:`fft_inv`
642///   :return_mechanism_type: one of :literal:`by_value` or :literal:`by_reference`
643///   :N: Anticipated number of times this object will be used.
644///   :H: This value indicates how the implementation should optimize its
645///       computation or resource use.
646///
647/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
648/// | I / O                   | A   | D               | input size    | output size   |
649/// +=========================+=====+=================+===============+===============+
650/// | complex<T> / complex<T> | 0,1 | fft_fwd,fft_inv | N x M         | N x M         |
651/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
652/// | T / complex<T>          | 0   | fft_fwd         | N x M         | N x (M/2 + 1) |
653/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
654/// | T / complex<T>          | 1   | fft_fwd         | N x M         | (N/2 + 1) x M |
655/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
656/// | complex<T> / T          | 0   | fft_inv         | N x (M/2 + 1) | N x M         |
657/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
658/// | complex<T> / T          | 1   | fft_inv         | (N/2 + 1) x M | N x M         |
659/// +-------------------------+-----+-----------------+---------------+---------------+
660template <typename I,
661	  typename O,
662	  int A = row,
663	  int D = fft_fwd,
664	  return_mechanism_type R = by_value,
665	  unsigned N = 0,
666	  alg_hint_type H = alg_time>
667class Fftm : public impl::Fftm_facade<
668  I, O,
669  typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::List<
670    vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fftm<I, O, A, D, R, N> >::type,
671  A, D, R, N, H>
672{
673  typedef vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::fftm<I, O, A, D, R, N> operation_type;
674  typedef impl::Fftm_facade<
675    I, O, 
676    typename vsip_csl::dispatcher::List<operation_type>::type,
677    A, D, R, N, H> base;
678public:
679  /// Create an :literal:`Fftm` object.
680  ///
681  /// Arguments:
682  ///   :dom: The domain of the matrix to be operated on.
683  ///   :scale: A scalar factor to be applied to the result.
684  Fftm(Domain<2> const& dom, typename base::scalar_type scale)
685    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
686    : base(dom, scale) {}
687};
688
689} // namespace vsip

691#endif // VSIP_IMPL_FFT_HPP
